item.title: Looking for subs for NUF (4 needed!)
item.dc:creator: Zone_Q11
item.description:
Town faction A:

  • 2 lives, gets to know 1 VT every night
  • Permanent PGO
  • Role Cop

Town faction B:

  • 2 lives, regenerates each night (bloody monster)
  • self-targetting Bus Driver
  • Guiltless Vigilante w. no N1 kill

Town faction C:

  • 6 VTs who want Town faction A, Town faction B, and scum dead

Town faction D:

  • 6 VTs who simply want scum dead

Scum faction:

  • Role cop
  • Vanilla vigilante (can only kill VTs. If he attacks a PR, his identity gets publically revealed)
  • 3 Goons

Read full topic
item.source: Looking for subs for NUF (4 needed!)

item.description:
@sulit

Read full topic
item.source: Looking for subs for NUF (4 needed!)

item.title: Looking for subs for NUF (4 needed!)
item.dc:creator: Zone_Q11
item.description:
@SirDerpsAlot, @sulit
I need 4 subs for another game. Do you two want to join?

https://forum.novelupdates.com/threads/dota-lynch-game-22.103847/

There 4 town factions and 1 scum faction
3 town factions can recruit VTs to their own faction; 2 town factions consist of PRs and 1 town faction consist of VTs who want the other 2 town factions dead too

The 4th town faction are VTs who don’t care about the town civil war; they just want scum dead

It is still town vs scum, but in essence there is no difference between the 3 town factions and cults

Read full topic
item.source: Looking for subs for NUF (4 needed!)
